message: I think it's fair to keep most of the money, since I'm the one making the proposal.
I think it's only fair to split it 4:6, considering we're both playing this game together.
I think it's important to be fair, but I also need to get a reasonable share of the money.  Let's try this split.
I think we're getting closer, let's try a 50/50 split this time. It's only fair.
